content.html: Hi Congressman Higgins! I'm a millennial trans woman who served in uniform and carried caskets while you couldn't be bothered to step away from your car dealership after 9/11 to go back in and serve during a time of war. Think of that next time before you say bullshit like this.
content.value:
Hi Congressman Higgins! I'm a millennial trans woman who served in uniform and carried caskets while you couldn't be bothered to step away from your car dealership after 9/11 to go back in and serve during a time of war.

Think of that next time before you say bullshit like this.
